turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hi, I would like to order a coffee today!”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! What kind of coffee would you like today — something like an espresso, latte, or cappuccino?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hi, could I please get a matcha latte?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, a matcha latte sounds great! Would you like it hot or iced?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “HOTAS.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great, a hot matcha latte it is! Would you like any specific milk, like almond, oat, or regular dairy?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I would like alt-milk, thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, oat milk it is! Would you like to add any sweetener or maybe some flavoring, like vanilla?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No, thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: All right, that sounds perfect! So, just a hot matcha latte with oat milk. Is there anything else I can get for you today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Actually, I want to ask, is the banana bread gluten-free?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That's a great question! Let me check on that for you. Our banana bread does have a gluten-free option. Would you like to add a slice to your order?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No, thanks. But I'd like a slice of cake.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it! We have a few cake options. Is there a particular type of cake you're in the mood for, like chocolate, cheesecake, or something else?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I would like chocolate, thanks.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Awesome, a slice of chocolate cake it is! So, to recap, you’ll have a hot matcha latte with oat milk and a slice of chocolate cake. Anything else I can do for you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No thanks, and how long will that take?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: It should be ready in just a few minutes, probably around three to five minutes at most. We'll have it fresh and waiting for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you, and I'll wait near the door, thanks.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! I'll let you know as soon as it's ready. Thanks for your order, and we'll see you in just a bit!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're welcome!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Sorry, hello, uh, do you, um, do you have anything vegan for my friend? How?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! We do have several vegan options. For drinks, we have almond milk, oat milk, and soy milk. And for food, we have vegan pastries and snacks as well. Let me know what your friend might be interested in!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Wait a minute. I'd like to check. Sorry.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No worries at all, take your time! Just let me know if you have any questions or need any help.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Transcript Unavailable

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, sounds good! Just let me know what you'd like to pick, and I'll make sure everything’s set.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, she'll have a slice of, um, no, a banana bread with gluten-free and she'll like espresso.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect! So that's one gluten-free banana bread and one espresso for your friend. That sounds lovely! Let me know if

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Awesome, that’s all set then! I’ll get everything prepared for you and your friend. If you need anything else, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Um, yes, and is there a combo price or something else?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We do have combo deals, and if you get both the banana bread and the espresso, we can offer you a little discount. I’ll make sure to apply that for you! Let me know if you’d like any more details.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay. Oh, thank you. So I'll change my cake to banana bread so that makes a combo with two banana breads and one matcha latte and one espresso, right?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, exactly! So that’s two slices of banana bread, one hot matcha latte, and one espresso. That definitely gives you a nice combo! I’ll get that all ready for you. Let me know if there

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! If you need anything else at all, just let me know. Otherwise, I’ll have everything ready shortly!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you very much. Have a good day!”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You too! Thanks so much, and have a wonderful day. If you need anything else, just give me a shout. Take care!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hello, um, what do you recommend today?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Hello! Well, today we’ve got some delicious options. Our matcha latte is always a favorite, and our chocolate cake is really popular as well. If you’re in the mood for something savory, we’ve got some great vegan pastries too. Let me know what you’re in the mood for!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, and what is your most popular drink?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Our most popular drink is definitely the matcha latte, especially with oat milk. It's a big hit with our regulars! But if you're looking for something different, we also have some fantastic coffees and specialty teas. Let me know what sounds good to you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, and what's the difference between a flat white and a latte?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great question! So, a flat white typically has a stronger espresso-to-milk ratio and a velvety microfoam, making it a bit more intense and less milky than a latte. On the other hand, a latte has more steamed milk and a lighter layer of foam, giving it a creamier, smoother texture. So it really depends on how strong and creamy you like your coffee!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, appreciate your help. And I'd like to ask, is there a student discount?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We do offer a student discount. Just show your student ID when you order, and we’ll apply that discount for you. Let me know if you need any other info!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you very much. Um, then.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’re very welcome! And if you have any more questions or need anything else, just let me know. I’m here to help!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, and I'd like to ask you about what kind of beans do you use for your espresso for my friends.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! We use a blend of high-quality, ethically sourced Arabica beans, and they’re roasted locally for maximum freshness and flavor. It gives the espresso a nice, rich, and balanced taste. If your friend has any preferences, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, so your beans are sourced from Arabic.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, exactly! We carefully select Arabica beans, known for their smooth and complex flavor profiles. It definitely makes a difference in the taste of our espresso!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “OK, and about brewing methods, I've never tried cold brew. What is like?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great question! Cold brew is made by steeping coarsely ground coffee in cold water for an extended period, usually around 12 to 24 hours. The result is a smooth, less acidic coffee with a naturally sweet flavor. It’s really refreshing, especially over ice!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, great. Thank you. And I'm interested in trying something new today. Can you make it have strength and without milk?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we can do that! I can definitely adjust the strength to be a bit lighter and use oat milk for a creamy, dairy-free option. That sounds like a delicious choice! Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like to customize.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, sorry, I'd like to change it to...”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No problem at all! Just let me know what you’d

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No, no, no, I'd want to change to AltMilk to...”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, no worries!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Almond milk, thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect! We’ll switch it over to almond milk for you. That sounds great. If there’s anything else you’d like to tweak, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you. No, thank you. That's it. That's it. All done, and have a good day.”
